name: part_005
file: tmp_【#holoIDChromaticFuture 】Free Partial - hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future [ScI02LHlT-w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section featuring Kobo Kanaeru, Vestia Zeta, and Kaela Kovalskia discussing their previous performance and interacting with the audience.

subtitles.original: Untung lagunya santai, easy listening,
subtitles.english: Luckily the song was chill, easy listening,

subtitles.original: jadi kita sambil keliling-keliling kan, nyapa fans, gitu ya.
subtitles.english: so we could walk around and greet the fans, right?

subtitles.original: Asik banget ya tadi ya,
subtitles.english: It was so fun,

subtitles.original: aku juga suka banget tadi di sebagian rap-nya ya.
subtitles.english: I really liked the rap part earlier.

subtitles.original: Da la da la da la da la...
subtitles.english: Da la da la da la da la...

subtitles.original: Itu, itu beda lagu gak sih?
subtitles.english: Wait, isn't that a different song?

subtitles.original: ...da la da la da la da la.
subtitles.english: ...da la da la da la da la.

subtitles.original: Enggak gitu, Bocil. Gak gitu, Bocil.
subtitles.english: Not like that, kiddo. Not like that, kiddo.

subtitles.original: Ya, tapi pokoknya asik lah ya kalau nyanyi lagu yang chill, santai-santai kayak gini.
subtitles.english: But anyway, it's fun to sing chill, relaxed songs like this.

subtitles.original: Iya, santai dong.
subtitles.english: Yeah, chill for sure.

subtitles.original: Tapi ngomongin soal santai, kita tuh sebenarnya belum bisa santai dulu.
subtitles.english: But speaking of chill, we actually can't chill just yet.

subtitles.original: Heh, santai.
subtitles.english: Hey, chill out.

subtitles.original: Karena katanya gak boleh santai...
subtitles.english: Because you said we can't chill...

subtitles.original: Iya, iya, jangan santai-santai. Jangan terlalu santai.
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, don't chill. Don't be too relaxed.

subtitles.original: Karena konser itu masih panjaaaaang.
subtitles.english: Because the concert is still loooooooong.

subtitles.original: Jadi sebelum itu, kalian ada nggak yang mau kalian sampaikan dulu? Mulai dari ini nih yang enggak bisa diem.
subtitles.english: So before that, is there anything you'd like to say? Let's start with this one who can't stay still.

subtitles.original: Tiga kata saja...
subtitles.english: Just three words...

subtitles.original: I love you.
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: Keren, the best. Sangat jelas ya.
subtitles.english: Cool, the best. Very clear.

subtitles.original: Tetap semangat.
subtitles.english: Keep up the spirit.

subtitles.original: Tetap semangat menjalani hidup ya.
subtitles.english: Keep your spirit up in life.

subtitles.original: Udah gitu aja. Pokoknya sampai akhir masih panjang. Semangat!
subtitles.english: That's it. Anyway, it's still a long way to the end. Fighting!

subtitles.original: Saranghaeyo!
subtitles.english: I love you!

subtitles.original: Gomawoyo!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: Oke, kalau aku, ya, semangat selalu.
subtitles.english: Okay, for me, well, always keep up the spirit.

subtitles.original: Semangat santai.
subtitles.english: Chill spirit.

subtitles.original: Hidup jangan terlalu dibawa serius.
subtitles.english: Don't take life too seriously.

subtitles.original: Semangat santai!
subtitles.english: Chill spirit!

subtitles.original: Oke kalau gitu kita lanjut ke... wait wait wait.
subtitles.english: Okay then, let's move on to... wait wait wait.

subtitles.original: Tunggu dulu. Sebelum selesai-selesai ini nih ya,
subtitles.english: Hold on. Before we wrap this up,

subtitles.original: kita teriak bareng-bareng penonton dulu nggak sih?
subtitles.english: should we shout together with the audience?

subtitles.original: Iya dong! Ayo ayo ayo!
subtitles.english: Of course! Let's go, let's go!

subtitles.original: Oke oke. Jadi kita teriak bareng ya.
subtitles.english: Okay, okay. So let's shout together.

subtitles.original: Dalam hitungan ketiga, kita sama-sama teriak 'Chromatic Future'. Oke ya?
subtitles.english: On the count of three, we'll all shout 'Chromatic Future' together. Okay?

subtitles.original: Oke oke, 'Chromatic Future' gitu kan?
subtitles.english: Okay okay, 'Chromatic Future' like that, right?

subtitles.original: Iya iya kayak gitu.
subtitles.english: Yeah, like that.

subtitles.original: Oke langsung ya sambil lihat sini sini sini.
subtitles.english: Okay, right away, while looking here, here, here.

subtitles.original: Aku ya, aku penonton yang ini. Penonton sini nih.
subtitles.english: Me, I'm for this audience. This audience right here.

subtitles.original: Aku ini deh yang tengah, yang tengah. Halo!
subtitles.english: I'll take the middle one then. Hello!

subtitles.original: Oke bareng-bareng ya.
subtitles.english: Okay, together now.

subtitles.original: Satu, dua, tiga...
subtitles.english: One, two, three...

subtitles.english: Chromatic Future!
